mdRecord.dcterms:title: North Gateway
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gardner, Alexander, 1821-1882 (possible)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Glass negative of stereoscopic view of the north lane looking north from the Mansion circle. Possibly by Alexander Gardner, 1866-1875. The north lane gate can be seen at the far end of the lane. The Gardener's House, Salt House and Spinning House are visible on the left and the Servant's Hall and the old ice house (just beyond the north lane gate) can be seen at right. Remnants of tape are visible along the edges of the glass.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
North Lane
